question: Write a letter to your internet service provider to complain. In the letter:- Describe the problem and why you are unhappy- Arrange for an engineer to visit your home- Request a reduction in your bill
text: My name is Jenny and I am writing this letter to draw your draw your attention to an issue which is currently facing because of your internet service.

Yesterday, the internet speed drop way down in the evening for some reason and  I'm still having the same issue. As I work from home, the internet is a very important factor for me and it could possibly affect my work. I tried to reset the router, but it didn't work out. I called the service centre as well but I had to wait for about 3 hours to reach out to an agent but then they told me that they had nothing they can do for me and asked me to write this letter to you.

If it is possible, I would like to book an appointment with an engineer from your side and let them take a look at my internet router and the cable to investigate what the issue was. Tomorrow around noon would be perfect for me.

Having said that, I would appreciate if I can get a discount for this matter on this month's bill as well as there is a statement that says customers can request a reduction if they go through any inconvenience.
I am looking forward to your prompt reply.
